tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I have known Dr. Padmasri V since 2006, when she assured me of my mom's hysterectomy operation for the terrible condition my mom was in, since then, the trust, faith & the credibility towards how she treats her patients is simply incredible & beyond what any one could explain in words. She is  friendly & straight forward, more than a counselling session, she makes all her conversation a practical experience **** *** ******* ********* **** *** ****** *****. I am currently getting the right guidance for my pregnancy & I am happy **** *** ** *** ***** *** **** ******* **** **** ***** *** *** **** *** ****** Thank you Ma'am for all your support & strength that you fill in, Stay blessed

Best wishes, 
Vidya

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Very good doctor, i don't know how to describe her in words, *** ********** * **** ****** *** ****** who are suffering from PCOS/PCOD or any pregnancy related issues, can contact Dr Padmasri without any doubt

I never ever thought that i will hv children's in my life due to hormonal imbalance/irregular period but by her treatment i am blessed with 2 boys in a short time, they are absolutely normal
Whenever i celebrate birthday of my children's i pray god for her to give a long n healthy life..

Thank you
Pavithra Arvind

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I am very disappointed with this doctor and I completely regret taking her consultation through out my pregnancy. 

Only her first visit was promising to us, as new parents we were very excited and had good hopes, after that all other visits very bad, she made me cry with her taunting. 

1. In my 3rd month scan, my cervix length was short, her explanation was scary.
She said: baby may come out and die (We as first time parents did not want to hear this from the doctor.

2. During pandemic time we had to contact her through whatsapp and she did not guide us to visit her every month. She used to see the report and confirm everything is fine. 

3. Like wise I sent my 5th month scan report to her, she confirmed everything is normal, as per advice, when there is emergency we should contact her(Since my pregnancy was going normal, I didn't meet her in 6th month pregnancy). Then I met her with my next scan which is 7th month scan. 
Very badly she yelled at me for the dress I wore *** *** ******* ** **** ***** **** *** ******** ** ***** ** *** ******* She treated me with zero respect. I came out crying.

She treated me and my husband as illitrate people. She wasn't giving chance to us to talk from our end. She used to stop us in every conversation.

I had zero trust on her, *** **** ******* ** **** *** *** ** planned C section to me. which we didn't agree. **** *** *** ****** *** *** said my husband ( Hello Boss, you don't understand what I am saying) the day I got paid, *** **** ***** ******* I went through pain for so many hours.

Now post deliver, I got Hernia in abdominal area, *** **** ***** *** ***** **** ** **** ****** **** ***** As a new mother I am scared to get another operation done. 

She did not help me to give leave extension letter, even after explaining about backpain, she refused to give the letter, instead she said why should I give the letter.

Not one incident, with many incident I had to write this review.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My wife had a thyroid condition. *** ******* ******** ****** ********** ** *** ****** *** *** **** * **** **** *** ********** ** ** **** ** *** ********** ***** Our family doctor then confirmed our doubts. Luckily, the baby wasn't harmed. This was a strange experience. I wouldn't recommend this doctor to anyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Appointment was given for 10 o'clock. Doctor arrived at 11 o'clock.

My wife is over weight and we are expecting a baby and this is our first child so we went with excitement. ****** ********* *** ***** *** ******* ** ****** and there were no single positive talks and my wife came out crying n freaked out about being pregnant.

****** *** **** ********** ** **** *** ****** ****** *** ***** *** **** *** ******

Totally disturbing and painful experience for my wife.

She neither wants to go there again nor wants to talk about  her experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: very good experience, friendliness with explanation about health condition and treatment. thank you for consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Padmasri is a very friendly doctor & she explains everything to the point. We are satisfied with the doctor. It's really value for your money.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We know Dr. Padmashri since 2013. She took care of my wife's both the delivery. Because of her we are a proud parents of 2 girl child. She is an amazing doctor, when we met her first time, my wife needed a emotional support over and above the medical treatment ..she got both from the Doctor. I wish her all the very best in life. -  Gopal Kondath

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Iam so lucky to have consulted Dr.Padmasri , she has been been given the best guidance throughout my pregnancy journey . she treats every situation so well, she is so friendly and her treatment and guidance are the best. she s so practical am so glad to meet her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I took my wife for MTP following anomaly scan.   I have not met a doctor like her to be frank with so straight and precise . she clearly makes us understand what and why we have come to her, very very clear of her check points procedures and decision without any ambiguity whatsoever at both the ends. god bless this world with more and more doctors like her in all specializations.  Long live Doctor.
